verses.roman:
nirantara premāveśe nirjane gamana
sukha anubhavi' prabhu kahena vacana

synonyms: nirantara—always; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; nirjane—in a solitary place; gamana—going; sukha anubhavi'-feeling happiness; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahena—says; vacana—statement.
translation: While traveling in this secluded forest and feeling very happy, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu made the following statement.
